long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The new Soccerhub extension, providing you the latest soccer news from all of the top leagues. While still being a great home for all of your web search needs with Bing web search and all of your favourite bookmarks just a click away. 

Important Information and links:

Data Collection:
Our service may collect Personal, Usage, and Search Data, which are anonymously stored to enhance your experience and improve our services. Read our comprehensive Privacy Policy for more information.

Privacy Policy - https://soccerhub.extension.news/privacypolicy.html
EULA - https://soccerhub.extension.news/eula.html
Terms And Conditions - https://soccerhub.extension.news/termsandconditions.html
Contact Us - https://soccerhub.extension.news/contactus.html
About Us - https://soccerhub.extension.news/aboutus.html

By clicking 'Add to chrome', I accept and agree to installing Soccerhub Extension and setting the New tab to https://www.bing.com is that provided by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
